title: RussiaUkraineTranslation
author: RussiaUkraineTranslation
content: A prominent Crypto news website and Youtube channel reviewed three different EVM privacy alternatives to Tornado cash: 0xMonero - 0xTIP bridgeCyclone - MixerAztec - L2https://twitter.com/defiantnews/status/1562637200168169474?s=21&t=HO4SisMhT6W_cBQySNoYaQWhat is your favorite Ethereum or EVM compatible privacy solution/mixer? Or are you still trying to use Tornado Cash with mirrors?
